meanings.definition: A machine for making multiple copies of written or drawn material.
meanings.sent1: The mimeo was used to create copies of the important document.
meanings.sent2: The office had a mimeo to duplicate the meeting agenda for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The mimeo hummed quietly as it diligently replicated the handwritten notes.
meanings.sent4: The mimeo worked like a busy bee, producing identical copies in no time.
meanings.sent5: The mimeo's magic lay in its ability to clone pages effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To reproduce (written or drawn material) by a mimeograph.
meanings.sent1: She would mimeo the announcement to distribute it to all employees.
meanings.sent2: They decided to mimeo the flyers for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: He mimeoed the joke sheet, making sure everyone got a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The mimeo machine whirred to life, faithfully copying each page.
meanings.sent5: Mimeoing the instructions ensured that everyone had a copy to refer to.
